{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = Asus RT-AC52U 01.jpg |image1_size = 150px |caption = AC750 Dual-Band Wireless Router |caption2 = |pp = https://www.asus.com/Networking/RTAC52U/ |sp = https://www.asus.com/Networking/RTAC52U/HelpDesk/ |dl = https://www.asus.com/Networking/RTAC52U/HelpDesk_Download/ |wikidevi = ASUS_RT-AC52U |wikipedia = |ddwrtsupport = |openwrtsupport = |tomatosupport = |gargoylesupport = |brand = ASUS |model = RT-AC52U |submodelappend = |submodel = |revision = A1 |subrevision = (2.30) |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |wlclass = AC750 |series = |type = wireless router |sernum = |fcc_id = MSQ-RTAC52U |icid = 3568A-RTAC52U |us_id = |boardid = 1244-01000923-50U |ecc_id = |cpu1chip1 = MediaTek;MT7620A;MT7620A, 1318-BMTH, CTPPP80B; |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = MIPS 24KEc |cpu1_type_rev = |cpu1spd = 580 |is_doc = |bus = 32-bit |flash1type = |fla1_num = |fla1chip = Zentel;A5U1GA31ATS-BC; |flash1size = 128 |flash1maxsize = |ram1type = |ram1type1 = |ram1spd = |ram1size = 128 |ram1chip = Winbond;W971GG6JB-25; |ram1_num = |nvramsize = |eth_cpu = true |sw_cpu = true |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = 100MbE |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 100MbE |ethstandard = |portbasedvlan = |802.1qvlan = |auto_mdix = |sup_jumbo = |ethoui = |oui = |bootwait = |stockbootloader = U-Boot;;(UBI); |stockos = Linux;2.6.36;; |exp_if_types = USB 2.0 |exp_usb_num = 1 |usb_hub = |pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 1 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = |pwr_barrel_inner = |pwr_barrel_len = |pwr_pol = |serial = yes,, 3.3V TTL,, |jtag = yes,, |specialfeat = |flags = AiCloud support |addchip = |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac |defaulip = 192.168.1.1 |defaultlogin = admin |defaultpass = admin |defaultssid = ASUS, ASUS_5G |defaultssid_regex = ^ASUS$,,, ^ASUS_5G$ |default_ch = |manuf = Edimax |manuf_model = |manuf_rev = |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = Padavan ? |availability = |eoldate = |fccapprovdate = 02/20/2014 |estreldate = |estprice = |upc = 886227461561 |ean = |dx_sku = |newegg = N82E16833320179 |asin = B00I1K3T8G |asin_country = |asin2 = |asin_country2 = |countrymanuf = China |buttons = |led = |dimensions = |weight = |wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1cpu = true |rad1oui = |rad1_ant_conn = |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 2 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad1n = 300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4 |wi2_if_name = |rad2chip1 = MediaTek;MT7610E;MT7610EN, 1315-AMAL, DTPNP859; |rad2oui = |rad2_ant_conn = |rad2txchains = 1 |rad2rxchains = 1 |rad2sstreams = 1 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac |rad2ac = 433 |rad2n = 150 |rad2a = 54 |rad2freq = 5 }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== Great-value wireless router for home and cloud use The '''ASUS''' logo, "1244-01000923-50U", and "U REV 2.30" :is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. The test report states the manuf. as ''Datamax Electronics (DongGuan)'' :This is presumed to be an ''[[Edimax]]'' P/N (1244-) Future support may be available with {{TPFirmware|Padavan}} (?) :The bootloader used is assumed to be '''U-Boot''' (NAND/UBI) Default SSIDs are per the FCC manual. :Concurrent dual-band, 2x2 ('''300'''Mbps [11n] max.) @ 2.4GHz, :1x1 ('''433'''Mbps [11ac] / '''150'''Mbps [11n] max.) @ 5GHz {{WiFiCert|WFA50145|10/04/2013}} ==Links of Interest== ===Reviews=== *[http://www.foxnetwork.ru/index.php/ru/component/content/article/150-asus-rt-ac52u.html Asus RT-AC52U On '''FoxNetwork'''] ===Forum threads=== *[http://forums.smallnetbuilder.com/showthread.php?p=80332 On '''SmallNetBuilder'''] (EN) *[http://forum.ixbt.com/topic.cgi?id=14:60674 On '''IXBT'''] (RU) ===Misc=== *[http://www.MediaTek.com/_en/03_news/01-2_newsDetail.php?sn=1063 ''MediaTek News - MediaTek First to Bring 802.11ac 1T1R''] ==Pictures==
'''Retail Images''' File:Asus RT-AC52U 01.jpg| File:Asus RT-AC52U 02.jpg| File:Asus RT-AC52U 03.jpg| File:Asus RT-AC52U 04.jpg| File:Asus RT-AC52U 05.jpg| File:Asus RT-AC52U 06.jpg| File:Asus RT-AC52U 07.jpg|
[[Has images::retail| ]][[Has images::external| ]] ==Notes== ===Additional specifications=== * USB functionality: 3G/4G connectivity, printer sharing, network storage * Multiple SSIDs: up to 6 (3x 2.4 GHz, 3x 5 GHz) * Dimensions (W x D x H): [[Dimensions::187 mm x 145 mm x 25 mm]] * Weight: [[Weight::270 g]] ===Probable used PSU(s)=== The power supply shown in the FCC external photos is a :'''DVE''' DSA-12PFA-09 FUS 120100. {{hasPowerSupply |brand = DVE |model = DSA-12PFA-09 |revision = FUS 120100 |input_v=100-240 |input_a=0.5 |input_c=AC |input_hz=50/60 |input_conn=NEMA 1-15P |output_v=12 |output_a=1 |output_c=DC |output_conn=barrel |output_OD=5.5 |output_ID=2.1 |output_LEN=9.5 |countrymanuf = China |style=small, horiz. }} ===Build info=== per ''ASUSWRT'' source (per an older [https://github.com/RMerl/asuswrt-merlin/commit/b2630aed8d3782d4f184e207ad4a28abc0340d78 target.mak
revision on the ''asuswrt-merlin'' github]) 
#########################################
# MTK platform, linux-2.6.36.x
# Valild option for BOOT_FLASH_TYPE are shown below:
# NOR, SPI, NAND
# Valild option for DRAM are shown below:
# 8M, 16M, 32M, 64M, 128M, 256M
# Valid option for SECOND_IF are shown below:
# NONE, MT7610
# RT3092, RT5392, RT5592, RT3593, RT3572, RT5572 (TBD) 
##########################################
 
export RT-AC52U := IPV6SUPP=y HTTPS=y MIPS32=r2 RALINK=y BBEXTRAS=y USBEXTRAS=y EBTABLES=y 
SAMBA3=y MODEM=y MODEMPIN=y PARENTAL2=y ACCEL_PPTPD=y PRINTER=y USB="USB" APP="network" 
AUTODICT=y LANWAN_LED=y SHP=y BUILD_NAME="RT-AC52U" RTAC52U=y NTFS3G=y BECEEM=y ODMPID=y 
WEBDAV=y CLOUDSYNC=y BTN_WIFITOG=y UBI=y UBIFS=y PSISTLOG=y DUAL_TRX=y LED_ALL=y NEW_RGDM=y 
EXT4FS=y RA_SKU=y \
BOOT_FLASH_TYPE=NAND \
DRAM=128M \
SECOND_IF=MT7610 \
EXTRA_KERNEL_CONFIGS="MT7620_BAUDRATE=115200 RT2880_DRAM_128M=y UBOOT_CMDLINE=y 
EXTERNAL_PA_EXTERNAL_LNA=y"
==See also== {{ASUS AC products}} [[Category:English Documentation]]
